select
t1.PackageId as packageid, t3.CatagoryId as catagoryid, t3.CatagoryName as catagoryname, t2.CommodityId as commodityid, t2.CommodityName as commodityname, t1.Number as number
from UserPackage t left join Package t1 left join Commodity t2 left join CommodityCatagory t3 on t2.CommodityCatagoryId = t3.CatagoryId on t1.CommodityId = t2.CommodityId on t.PackageId = t1.PackageId
where t.UserId = #{value,jdbcType=BIGINT}
